thread.title: Stocks end roller-coaster session with solid gains
thread.title_full: Stocks end roller-coaster session with solid gains - MarketWatch

author: Anora Mahmudova
title: Stocks end roller-coaster session with solid gains
text:
U.S. stocks swung violently on Thursday, at one point paring most of their gains, only to rebound in the final hour and end the session with solid gains. The main indexes managed to close higher for the second-straight session. Thursday rally was attributed to optimism over China's growth following a rebound in the country's stock market and upbeat data on U.S. gross domestic product. The Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +2.27% gained 369.46 points, or 2.3%, to 16,654.97, with all 30 members of the blue-chip index finishing higher. The S&P 500 SPX, +2.43% closed 47.18 points, or 2.4% higher at 1,987.69. The Nasdaq Composite COMP, +2.45% ended the day up 115.17 points, or 2.5% at 4,812.71.
Read the full story: U.S. stocks close higher for 2nd day, show gain on week
